# React Native Web Landing Page Project

## Project Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Get React Native Web project setup info
- [x] Scaffold React Native Web project

- [x] Create Webpack configuration

- [x] Create source files structure
- [x] Create public folder with HTML template

## Project Type
React Native Web landing page with browser support via npm start

## Tech Stack
- React Native Web
- Webpack 5
- Babel
- React 18

## Development
Run `npm install` then `npm start` to launch in browser
